name: Duckman Tennis
description:
Smash the ball, dash fast and halt the flow of time to beat your friends!

Duckman and friends take to the tennis court to see who's ace! Serve it up in both singles or doubles with up to 3 of your friends in Freeplay Mode, or duke it out against AI opponents as you work your way through Tourney Mode.

As you earn more and more cups by winning tournaments in single player – or in doubles with a friend – you'll unlock new characters! Win every cup, and you might even unlock something special.

NOTE: Multiplayer is local only and requires controllers, although one player can play on keyboard. Gamepad support works on MacOS, but may be more limited.
